entities.name: Vexil Thorn
entities.description: A lanky, red-skinned tiefling with curling black horns and piercing yellow eyes. Vexil is a fast-talking rogue with a sharp wit and a love for elaborate cons.

entities.name: Etta Wren
entities.description: A stocky, gray-haired woman with warm brown eyes and a perpetual smirk. Etta is a retired airship captain who now runs a small but thriving black-market trading post.
